channel.title: Command
channel.description:
Can some help me whit create a command..
Name: Money Item : 0995 Amount = 999999 U can use it one time! If u typ it for the 2nd time than get all user a messenge: (Player) is a noob rofl :)

item.title: Command
item.dc:creator: @mLexus mLexus
item.description:
@mLexus wrote:

I know, i told him it won’t work, but bleh, i say go ahead.

item.title: Command
item.dc:creator: @mLexus mLexus
item.description:
@mLexus wrote:

[quote=“yorrick, post:7, topic:201408”][quote author=I_p0t_I link=topic=266069.msg2199111#msg2199111 date=1208639687]
ill have it in about 1 min.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 19, 2008, 10:16:40 AM[/size][hr] if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“money”)) {
if (starter == 0) {
addItem(995, 25000000);
sendMessage(“zero scape Starter Package”);
starter = 1;
savemoreinfo();
savechar();
} else if (starter == 1) {
sendMessage(“Sorry.”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
+ " Is a noob and is trying to get a extra Money!!! :p");

        }
    }

[/quote]

lolz were i must put in in my client.java ?[/quote]

Along with your other commands.

Read full topic
